comment.raw:
/**
 * Converts a hex color string to an array of rgb values.
 *
 * @param hex - A css hex color string, i.e. `#fff` or `#ffffff`
 */
comment.summary: Converts a hex color string to an array of rgb values.

params.name: hex
params.description: A css hex color string, i.e.`#fff`or`#ffffff`
